name: Hexweaver
description:
Hone your spell(ing) skills

Weave hexes and score spellcraft points by spelling 3 six-letter words (6-6-6) using the letter tiles displayed.

Developed as part of the Eggplant Community Game Jam 12: Hexes

Controls

Types in words using your keyboard. Mobile browsers not supported.

Tips
  • Try to spell as many words as possible before time runs out.
  • Each letter is worth a number of spellcraft points and can be used multiple times.

  • Bonus points are awarded the first time a letter tile is used.

  • Use backspace to remove unwanted letters.
